pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 23, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Etobicoke, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Finance Bill Morneau, Minister of Environment and Climate Change Catherine McKenna and Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan, will make an important announcement. A media availability will follow. The Prime Minister will then hold a conversation with students of Humber Collegeâ€™s Sustainability Program.

L125, Learning Resources Commons Building, North Campus
Humber College
205 Humber College Boulevard

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to park in Parking Lot 7.
    • Media should present themselves to the main lobby of the Learning Resources Commons Building.

Media appearances

8:10 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One, Metro Morning.
9:45 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 1310News Ottawa.
